channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: X timelines aren’t updating for many users
item.description: Sometime Thursday night, timelines stopped updating for a number of users on X, the social network owned by billionaire Elon Musk. Many users report t...

item.title: 14 Best Office Chairs of 2025— I've Tested 55+ to Pick Them
item.description: Sitting at a desk for hours? Upgrade your WFH setup and work in style with these comfy WIRED-tested seats.

item.title: Florida bill requiring encryption backdoors for social media accounts has failed
item.description: The bill would have required social media companies create encryption backdoors to allow access to users' private information.

item.title: Apple said to be developing new chips for smart glasses, Macs, and more
item.description: Apple is reportedly developing new chips to drive smart glasses similar to Meta’s Ray-Ban Meta as well as more powerful Macs and AI servers. Bloomberg...

item.title: Netgear Orbi 770 Series Review: Wi-Fi 7 Family Harmony
item.description: This reliable mesh is perfect for families looking to welcome Wi-Fi 7 into their homes.

item.title: Buy Now or Pay More Later? ‘Macroeconomic Uncertainty’ Has Shoppers Anxious
item.description: President Trump’s tariffs have started pushing prices higher. Tech giants and ecommerce strategists offer some clues on when to buy.

item.title: One of Elon Musk’s longtime VCs is suing his former employer after allegedly being fired

item.title: 20 Best Mac Accessories (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From a Mac Mini hub to mechanical keyboards, these curated gadgets will upgrade your Mac-powered desktop.

item.title: Therm-a-Rest NeoLoft Sleeping Pad Review: Cushy Backcountry Comfort
item.description: Therm-a-Rest’s cushy sleeping pad virtually guarantees a good night’s sleep when you’re out in the backcountry.
